code: import React,{useEffect}from'react';import{useDrop}from'react-dnd';import socket from'./socket';import Icon from'./Icon';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BattleMap=_ref=>{let{mapImage,icons,setIcons}=_ref;const room=window.location.pathname.split("/").pop();const[,drop]=useDrop({accept:'ICON',drop:(item,monitor)=>{const dropTargetRect=monitor.getDropTargetRect();const clientOffset=monitor.getClientOffset();if(!dropTargetRect||!clientOffset)return;const newLeft=Math.round(clientOffset.x-dropTargetRect.left);const newTop=Math.round(clientOffset.y-dropTargetRect.top);setIcons(prev=>{const exists=prev.find(i=>i.id===item.id&&i.left!==undefined);if(exists){const updated=prev.map(i=>i.id===item.id?{...i,left:newLeft,top:newTop}:i);socket.emit("moveIcon",{room,iconId:item.id,newPosition:{left:newLeft,top:newTop}});return updated;}else{const newIcon={...item,left:newLeft,top:newTop};socket.emit("moveIcon",{room,iconId:item.id,newPosition:{left:newLeft,top:newTop}});return[...prev,newIcon];}});}});useEffect(()=>{socket.on("iconMoved",_ref2=>{let{iconId,newPosition}=_ref2;setIcons(prev=>prev.map(icon=>icon.id===iconId?{...icon,...newPosition}:icon));});return()=>{socket.off("iconMoved");};},[setIcons]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{ref:drop,style:{position:'relative',width:'100%',height:'100%',overflow:'hidden'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:mapImage,alt:"Battle Map",style:{width:'100%',height:'100%',objectFit:'contain',display:'block'}}),icons.filter(icon=>typeof icon.left==='number'&&typeof icon.top==='number').map(icon=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{icon:icon},icon.id)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:{position:'absolute',bottom:'10px',right:'10px',display:'flex',gap:'10px',zIndex:5},children:icons.filter(icon=>typeof icon.left!=='number'||typeof icon.top!=='number').map(icon=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Icon,{icon:icon},icon.id))})]});};export default BattleMap;
